name: Yul-Gok
meaning: Yul-Gok is the pseudonym of a great philosopher and scholar Yi I (1536-1584) nicknamed the ‘Confucius of Korea’. The 38 movements of this pattern represent his birthplace on 38 degrees latitude and the diagram represents the word scholar.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step left to 9 o'clock into sitting stance. Extend left arm to a middle punch position.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in sitting stance. Perform right middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in sitting stance. Perform left middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Shift left foot to right foot. Step right foot into sitting stance to 3 o'clock. Perform right middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in sitting stance. Perform left middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in sitting stance. Perform right middle punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Move the right leg in and out to 2 o'clock. Right walking stance. Perform right middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Low front snap kick
moves.description: Keep arms in place. Perform left low front snap kick.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Lower into left walking stance. Perform left middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform right middle punch.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Bring the left leg in and then out to 10 o'clock. Left walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok kaunde makgi

moves.title: Low front snap kick
moves.description: Keep arms in place. Perform right low front snap kick.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Lower into right walking stance. Perform right middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform left middle punch.

moves.title: Middle palm hooking block
moves.description: Bring the right leg in then out to 12 o'clock. Right walking stance. Perform right middle palm hooking block.

moves.title: Middle reverse palm hooking block
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform reverse palm hooking block.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform left middle punch, driving the rear heel down.

moves.title: Middle palm hooking block
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. Perform middle palm hooking block.

moves.title: Middle reverse palm hooking block
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform reverse palm hooking block.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform left middle punch.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: Middle guarding block
moves.description: Bring left leg into right bending ready stance A faceing 12 o'clock. Perform middle outer forearm guarding block.
moves.korean: guburyo junbi sogi bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: Middle side piercing kick
moves.description: Perform left middle side piercing kick to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Middle elbow strike
moves.description: Lower into left walking stance to 12 o'clock. Perform right middle elbow front strike.

moves.title: Middle guarding block
moves.description: Draw the right leg into a left bending ready stance A. Pivoting 180 degrees to the right on the left foot to face 6 o'clock. Perform middle outer forearm guarding block.
moves.korean: guburyo junbi sogi bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: Middle side piercing kick
moves.description: Perform right middle side piercing kick to 6 o'clock.

moves.title: Middle elbow strike
moves.description: Lower into right walking stance. Perform left middle elbow front strike.

moves.title: Twin knifehand block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees, move the left foot to right L-stance facing 3 o'clock. Perform twin knifehand block.

moves.title: Middle straight fingertip thrust
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle straight fingertip thrust.

moves.title: Twin knifehand block
moves.description: Draw right foot to left foot. Turn right 180 degrees to face 9 o'clock into left L-stance. Perform twin knifehand block.

moves.title: Middle straight fingertip thrust
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. Perform middle straight fingertip thrust.

moves.title: High outer forearm side block
moves.description: Pivot on the right foot left 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Left walking stance. Perform left high outer forearm side block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: High outer forearm side block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock to a right walking stance. Perform right high outer forearm side block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Remain in walking stance. Perform middle punch.

moves.title: High backfist side strike
moves.description: Jump to 6 o'clock back to the starting position. Form left X-stance. Perform high backfist side strike.
moves.korean: kyocha so dung joomuk nopunde yop taerigi

moves.title: High double forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees right to 3 o'clock. Step forward into right walking stance. Perform high double forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so doo palmok nopunde makgi

moves.title: High double forearm block
moves.description: Bring right foot to left and turn 180 degrees left to 9 o'clock. Step forward into left walking stance. Perform high double forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so doo palmok nopunde makgi

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Bring the left foot back to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.
